about_the_game:
The Bean Trials is a unique multiplayer mini game versus where you take on the role of a “bean” and compete against other beans to see who is the best! Compete in over 20 unique mini games and customize yourself with over 2,000,000 possible combinations! Using coins earned from doing challenges or winning games you can purchase new looks and items to make your bean just like what you dreamed of! Join the lively world with upbeat music and in-game text and voice chat! The possibilities of what you and your bean can do are endless!

Feel stuck? Try practice mode to work on your skills to destroy the competition!

Want to play with friends? Hop into a private match and get up to 15 other beans to compete against!

Think you’re the greatest? Try to top the Leaderboards to show true superiority!

So why wait any longer? Get on in, customize yourself to your dream bean, and show everyone what it means to dominate the competition!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (Dual-Core) or Apple M1 chip
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 Or Apple M1 GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated audio or a compatible external sound card

name: The Bean Trials

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon RX 560 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card (integrated audio is sufficient)
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 20,000,000,000
  • Memory: 999 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1000,000
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200000 GB available space
  • Sound Card: The ability to hear noises, including but not limited to: explosions, beans crying, and the faint sound of you questioning your life choices
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Minimum resolution of 256x256 because who needs clarity when you have beans?

short_description: In The Bean Trials, join your friends in competing to see who is the best! Play in over 20 different minigames all while trying to top the Leaderboards! Talk in text or voice chat with other beans while you complete challenges, win to earn coins, and unlock over 100 unique items for your bean!
